      • fitsIn

        public boolean fitsIn(int width,
             int height)
        Determines whether this size object fits inside a rectangle of the given width and height
        Parameters:
        width - The width to check against.
        height - The height to check against.
        Returns:
        True, if the size fits inside the described rectangle, otherwise, false.
